title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT) Support
description: During the UAT phase of a project, a customer reports that a configured workflow is not behaving as expected.

tasks.description: Receive the bug report from the UAT tester.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant understands the reported issue and the expected behavior.

tasks.description: Review the workflow's configuration settings in the admin panel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant finds a misconfigured rule in the workflow logic (e.g., a condition is 'AND' instead of 'OR').

tasks.description: Correct the configuration and ask the UAT tester to re-test the scenario.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant fixes the issue, and the tester confirms the workflow now functions correctly.
